channel.title: Comments on: The Future of This Blog
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: I did a lot on the first year. The second year was indeed mostly surfing ;) (any future employers of mine should disregard this message)
item.content:encoded:
I did a lot on the first year.
The second year was indeed mostly surfing ;)
(any future employers of mine should disregard this message)

item.title: By: sveta the great
item.dc:creator: sveta the great
item.description: Kredi told me he was upset when he read this post. "This means the guy did nothing but surfing the 'net instead of working..."
item.content:encoded:
Kredi told me he was upset when he read this post.
“This means the guy did nothing but surfing the ‘net instead of working…”
